notes.text:
The deck has two abilities. 1) Dealing with heavy back row 2) Overrunning strong monsters such as buffed Dinos, AGs, Laquari, Hazies, REZ.
The advantages of Sergeant and most of the S/Ts are obvious.
Wildeheart is immune to Traps and with Skyscraper can overruns most monsters.
Neos is acceptably strong in itself and gets to 2900 with Skyscraper outmatching everything but Golem and a buffed Dakiny. 2 seems optimal to me since he doesn’t bring anything to the table but ATK.
Chow Lei is a weaker Sergeant and can probably be replaced. Impenetrable Attack is just so annoying so I added it.
Cosmic cyclone is useful for the End Phase and can trigger Skyscraper.
A second Floodgate would be better but I don’t have it. Wall of D should get kicked for that imo.
Mirror Wall tiggers Skyscraper and protects a second turn making it pretty good in this deck. The 3rd one could be replaced.

The deck is probably not good to win a MCS as sooner or later you’ll loose due to a brick monster hand. For a KC cup is seems ok though as it can deal with a large range of decks.
The skill buff would have helped occasionally. I don’t think it will make the deck that much better though.
